Package application.user

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
application.user.CustomerController
public class CustomerController extends Object
The CustomerController class holds and manages the customer information for the client side of the application. It includes methods for setting and getting the current customer, credit number, machine id, subscription status, subscriber number,and whether the customer is logged in.
Author:
Ron & Nitsan
